<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202662</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Favorite Restaurant Database</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lieblingsgaststätte-Datenbank</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Base de données Préférée de Restaurant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Base de dados Favorita Do Restaurante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Base di dati Favorita Del Ristorante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγαπημένη βάση δεδομένων εστιατορίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Base de datos Preferida Del Restaurante</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will be able to show their ability to independently create a database.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer können, ihre Fähigkeit zu zeigen,
eine Datenbank unabhängig zu erstellen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants pourront montrer leur capacité de 
créer indépendamment une base de données.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes poderão  mostrar sua abilidade de 
criar independentemente uma base de dados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi potranno mostrare la loro capacità di
creare indipendentemente una base di dati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα είναι σε θέση να εμφανίσουν 
δυνατότητά τους να δημιουργήσουν ανεξάρτητα μια βάση δεδομένων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes podrán mostrar su capacidad de 
crear independientemente una base de datos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>

            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>

        </educational>

    </metadata>
  </description>
